home.title: Starter App
home.description: This is a template project demonstrating the Sudobility architecture pattern. It shows how to build a full-stack application with shared types, a Hono API, TanStack Query hooks, Zustand stores, and a React web app.
home.feature1Desc: TypeScript type definitions shared between frontend and backend for type safety across the stack.
home.feature2Desc: Automatic caching, cache invalidation, and background refetching with TanStack Query hooks.
home.feature3Desc: Lightweight state management with Zustand for offline cache and business logic.
